Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a cream-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is partially red in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393363) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393363)
